Stephoscope Stephanie Oehler - - Health & Fitness - Stephoscope is an informative podcast themed around topics in public health and medicine. Podcast host, Stephanie Oehler, addresses topics such as threats to public health and flaws in the U.S. healthcare system. Stephoscope will bring you the scoop on current events in public health and medicine! - [Pandemic Fatigue, New Strains of Coronavirus, and Vaccine Distribution](https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/pandemic-fatigue-new-strains-of-coronavirus-and/id1518151820?i=1000505703370) Pandemic Fatigue, New Strains of Coronavirus, and Vaccine Distribution In this episode, I discuss the role of pandemic fatigue in rising coronavirus cases, the new strains of covid-19, why many Americans are reluctant to get vaccinated, plans for mass vaccine distribution, and how 2021 may look in terms of the pandemic.
